de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.transform

Class CheckstyleSaxHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.transform.CheckstyleSaxHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler

     class CheckstyleSaxHandler
extends DefaultHandler
    SAX based parser for Checkstyle log files. Format of log: 
          <checkstyle version="5.4">
          <file name="...">
              <error line="2" column="22" severity="error" message="Line contains a tab character."
                  source="com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.whitespace.FileTabCharacterCheck"/>
              ...
          </file>
          ...
      </checkstyle>
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

      • recognizeTag

        private void recognizeTag(String tagName)
        Tries to recognize the tag by it's name and set it as currentTag. Throws a IllegalStateException if a unrecognizable tag name was given.
        Parameters:
        tagName - must not be null or empty

      • isCurrentTag

        private boolean isCurrentTag(CheckstyleSaxHandler.ReportTags tag)
        Whether the currentTag is of a particular tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - must not be null
        Returns:
        true if currentTag is same as given tag, else false
